Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: A 19-building Connecticut portfolio, totaling 970,000 SF of well-positioned industrial and flex buildings.These properties are located in the Manchester Industrial Park (Manchester, CT), on Hayden Station Road (Windsor, CT) and on MacCausland Court (Cheshire, CT.) Each building was designed to have the ability to accommodate tenants of various sizes and to provide building specifications that make them usable for a variety of user types.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present SL Industrial Properties, a 19 building Connecticut Portfolio, totaling 970,000 SF of well positioned Industrial and Flex Buildings. These properties are located in the Manchester Industrial Park (Manchester, CT), on Hayden Station Road (Windsor, CT) and on MacCausland Court (Cheshire, CT.) Each building was designed to have the ability to accommodate tenants of various sizes and to provide building specifications that make them usable for a variety of user types.
Building is a former CL&P work center.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: With a total of 71 acres, Winstanley Logistics Center @ 113 North Maple Street is ideally located halfway between New York City and Boston, in proximity to Exits 48 and 49 on Interstate 91 and just 20 minutes to Bradley International Airport.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to present the Winstanley Logistics Center @ 113 North Maple Street, a 500,000 SF state-of-the-art distribution facility in Enfield, CT. The facility is currently under construction and is scheduled to deliver in August 2021. The property is pre-leased to a 260,000 SF Class A tenant, leaving 240,000 SF available for lease.

Available Space           Up to 240,000 SF
